quotes.quote: You don't love me now / You just hurt me now / It's over, it's over / I'm not looking back / I'm not going back / It's over, it's over.
I'm not thinking of you, / I'm not broken in two, / I'm not looking back, / My love's wasted on you.
No turning back / I'm moving on / Not looking back / I'm giving him / All that I have / No turning back.
I start to run, I'm still young / Not looking back from where I come / You get this life, just one time / You do yours and I'll do mine / So I run.
I'm not looking back / I'm done with that / Wanna give You all I have.
I don't regret / Not looking back / What better way to cut the crap.
Oh no, I'm not looking back / To rewrite our story's past / I gave up years ago / And as guarded as I am / I've got things I've left unsaid / I'm not a kid.

Slow but sure, I'm commin' around. / No I'm not looking back I'm moving on now / But I, won't go so far as to say that I'm fine. / Too much of what I've felt for you remains. / I'd like to believe in the healing hands of time.
I'm finally up to speed / I'm in over my head / And I'm not looking back.
I know I'm stronger now / Who's looking south / Not me I'm not looking back / I'm done denying the truth to anyone / Cause I'm alive.
I'm not looking back, I'm so done with that / All the sorrow and regret / And I remember almost everything / Watch me walk as I forget.
No I'm not looking back no more / The past is close behind.
Now that is over and I've seen right through / Not looking back again I'll start anew / Was making love to you such a wasted time / Maybe I love you, still, I'll get you off my mind.
You're fascinated with the old me / And I bet you hate it when we don't scream / You're stuck in the past / And I'm not looking back.

Oh what a freedom like a sail in the wind, / Not looking back, not forgetting where I've been / Smiling as I watch the years roll by, / I'm moving on from my mistakes, / And I'm learning how to take it day by day, / On my highway.
Go, see how far I can reach / I'm not looking back / Until I get exactly what I need / Cause there is no shine of your possibilities.

I can hear my mama crying as I cross that county line / Cause she knows I'm not looking back I'm leaving all this shit behind / I told her I'm a soldier I'm wiser, and I'm older / I got my education now I'm out of here it's over.
It's not up to you to save me / And there's no turning back, this is it. / I'm on a one-way track / Not looking back.
Bottle it up and learn to live again / You're not taking it slow or just fast enough / Not looking back when there's a reason to move on / Some things you can't erase / We all need space.
No looking back / Just focus on what's coming.
Don't look back, keep movin' ahead / You're guaranteed to win.
No more looking back, / No more living in the past, / Yesterday's gone and that's a fact, / Now there's no more looking back.
Moving on away from you / I guess it's time, time to break free / I don't look back / No looking back.
I've never particularly liked the idea of looking back; I'd rather look forward.
If you're always looking back at what you've lost, you'll never discover the treasure that lies just up ahead.
Look up, always. Look back, never.
Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
Never look backwards or you'll fall down the stairs.
Always look at what you have left. Never look at what you have lost.
